val:
It’s 1999 and I’m six years old. My sticky little fingers are wrapped around the light plastic of my N64 controller and I’m about to finally play a game that I’ve only ever been able to play at my older cousin’s house. The game loads up and that’s when I’m first hit with the first of Koji Kondo’s masterpiece soundtrack.

You’re immediately plunged into the game world, quickly establishing yourself as a outside-member of a peter-pan style fairy community full of children who never grow older. However your great elder - the Deku Tree - is quick to summon you and lay upon you a great burden: to leave your paradise forest and take up a great quest to aid the princess of Hyrule in your kingdom’s protection. You will never be able to return to Kokiri forest, and shall grow old and perish outside it.

How the fuck did they rate this E for Everone???
